programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: Mladi Angus Mac MacGyver radi za tajnu organizaciju američke vlade. Živote spašava pomoću svojih nekonvencionalnih vještina rješavanja problema. Mladi Angus Mac MacGyver radi za tajnu organizaciju američke vlade. Živote spašava pomoću svojih nekonvencionalnih vještina rješavanja problema.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Kako bi se razriješili brojni zločini, tu je ekipa za očevid CSI: Miami. Pred njima se nalaze mnogi zločini i misteriji koje treba riješiti, a predvodi ih poručnik Horatio Caine (David Caruso). Caine i Delko su u Brazilu. Odjel nakon Natalijinog prelaska u Policiju održava Duquesne. Čekaju ih istrage zločina, ali i rješavanje unutarnjih problema. Wolfe se slučajno upliće u krivotvorenje, a Duquesne je u istrazi bande ugrožen život….

Proceduralna drama "911" je brzi uvid u život i karijere ljudi u hitnim službama - policajci, bolničari, vatrogasci - ljudi koji svoj život stavljaju na kocku kako bi spasili druge. Autori Ryan Murphy, Brad Falchuk i Tim Minear ponovno promišljaju proceduralnu dramu hitne službe istražujući pritisak koji doživljavaju policajci, vatrogasci i dispečeri koji su pogurnuti u zastrašujuće, šokantne situacije od kojih staje srce.

programme.title: Hart of Dixie
Južnjačko srce
programme.desc:
Hart of Dixie: Created by Leila Gerstein. With Rachel Bilson, Jaime King, Cress Williams, Wilson Bethel. New Yorker and new doctor Zoe Hart accepts an offer from a stranger, Dr. Harley Wilkes, to work in his medical practice in Bluebell, Alabama. She arrives to find that he has died and left half the practice to her in his will." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1832979/","name":"Hart of Dixie","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk2NDU1MzQ3NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDk2NzQzNg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"New Yorker and new doctor Zoe Hart accepts an offer from a stranger, Dr. Harley Wilkes, to work in his medical practice in Bluebell, Alabama. She arrives to find that he has died and left half the practice to her in his will.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1832979/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"e_man_7-66-977435"},"dateCreated":"2012-03-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Hart of Dixie deserves a second season.","reviewBody":"Its detractors mostly fault it for what it's not- it's not your typical doctor-drama and it's not trying to portray a real-life surgeon. 

If you judge the show on what it is trying to do- provide 40 minutes of heart-warming entertainment, then I think Rachel Bilson's nice-chick schtick and Lemon's bullying friendship along with great support from the rest of the cast, provides a nice alternative to practically every other TV programme out there.

I love that Hart of Dixie lets you take it with a pinch of salt. I like watching a medically oriented programme that doesn't recycle those ER clichés that every such show from Third Watch to Grey's Anatomy has to hobble through for the plot. 'Get the paddles! clear!', 'he's gone into v-tach', tacky-cardia. I mean gimme a break. I'm sorry but the fake blood, fake body parts, fake killing and murdering all have their place but if a show wants a lighter take on living, outside of Vegas, Miami and LA with fewer guns, more food, flirting, and dating and then what's not to like? I wish them many happy returns. 

Hart of Dixie definitely deserves a second and third season as far as I'm concerned. I think the show has plenty of material to explore with relationships, farce & fancy and the fish out of water element. I really hope it gets renewed.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":49924,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2011-09-26","keywords":"fish out of water,doctor,female doctor,small town,female protagonist","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1377375/","name":"Rachel Bilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0454809/","name":"Jaime King"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0930317/","name":"Cress Williams"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0299663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005035/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1771570/","name":"Leila Gerstein"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Hart Of Dixie","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2390932761","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2U5M2VlNzYtZGExOS00NzhjLTk1NzMtOTIzYTkwZjNkMDU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2U5M2VlNzYtZGExOS00NzhjLTk1NzMtOTIzYTkwZjNkMDU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Hart Of Dixie"}}</script><metacontent="

If you judge the show on what it is trying to do- provide 40 minutes of heart-warming entertainment, then I think Rachel Bilson's nice-chick schtick and Lemon's bullying friendship along with great support from the rest of the cast, provides a nice alternative to practically every other TV programme out there.

I love that Hart of Dixie lets you take it with a pinch of salt. programme.title: Hart of Dixie
Južnjačko srce
programme.desc:
Hart of Dixie: Created by Leila Gerstein. With Rachel Bilson, Jaime King, Cress Williams, Wilson Bethel. New Yorker and new doctor Zoe Hart accepts an offer from a stranger, Dr. Harley Wilkes, to work in his medical practice in Bluebell, Alabama. She arrives to find that he has died and left half the practice to her in his will." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1832979/","name":"Hart of Dixie","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk2NDU1MzQ3NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDk2NzQzNg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"New Yorker and new doctor Zoe Hart accepts an offer from a stranger, Dr. Harley Wilkes, to work in his medical practice in Bluebell, Alabama. She arrives to find that he has died and left half the practice to her in his will.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1832979/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"e_man_7-66-977435"},"dateCreated":"2012-03-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Hart of Dixie deserves a second season.","reviewBody":"Its detractors mostly fault it for what it's not- it's not your typical doctor-drama and it's not trying to portray a real-life surgeon. 

If you judge the show on what it is trying to do- provide 40 minutes of heart-warming entertainment, then I think Rachel Bilson's nice-chick schtick and Lemon's bullying friendship along with great support from the rest of the cast, provides a nice alternative to practically every other TV programme out there.

I love that Hart of Dixie lets you take it with a pinch of salt. I like watching a medically oriented programme that doesn't recycle those ER clichés that every such show from Third Watch to Grey's Anatomy has to hobble through for the plot. 'Get the paddles! clear!', 'he's gone into v-tach', tacky-cardia. I mean gimme a break. I'm sorry but the fake blood, fake body parts, fake killing and murdering all have their place but if a show wants a lighter take on living, outside of Vegas, Miami and LA with fewer guns, more food, flirting, and dating and then what's not to like? I wish them many happy returns. 

Hart of Dixie definitely deserves a second and third season as far as I'm concerned. I think the show has plenty of material to explore with relationships, farce & fancy and the fish out of water element. I really hope it gets renewed.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":49924,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2011-09-26","keywords":"fish out of water,doctor,female doctor,small town,female protagonist","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1377375/","name":"Rachel Bilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0454809/","name":"Jaime King"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0930317/","name":"Cress Williams"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0299663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005035/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1771570/","name":"Leila Gerstein"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Hart Of Dixie","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2390932761","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2U5M2VlNzYtZGExOS00NzhjLTk1NzMtOTIzYTkwZjNkMDU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2U5M2VlNzYtZGExOS00NzhjLTk1NzMtOTIzYTkwZjNkMDU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Hart Of Dixie"}}</script><metacontent="

New Yorker and new doctor Zoe Hart accepts an offer from a stranger, Dr. Harley Wilkes, to work in his medical practice in Bluebell, Alabama. She arrives to find that he has died and left half the practice to her in his will." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1832979/","name":"Hart of Dixie","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk2NDU1MzQ3NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDk2NzQzNg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"New Yorker and new doctor Zoe Hart accepts an offer from a stranger, Dr. Harley Wilkes, to work in his medical practice in Bluebell, Alabama. She arrives to find that he has died and left half the practice to her in his will.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1832979/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"e_man_7-66-977435","dateCreated":"2012-03-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Hart of Dixie deserves a second season.","reviewBody":"Its detractors mostly fault it for what it's not- it's not your typical doctor-drama and it's not trying to portray a real-life surgeon. 

If you judge the show on what it is trying to do- provide 40 minutes of heart-warming entertainment, then I think Rachel Bilson's nice-chick schtick and Lemon's bullying friendship along with great support from the rest of the cast, provides a nice alternative to practically every other TV programme out there.

I love that Hart of Dixie lets you take it with a pinch of salt. I like watching a medically oriented programme that doesn't recycle those ER clichés that every such show from Third Watch to Grey's Anatomy has to hobble through for the plot. 'Get the paddles! clear!', 'he's gone into v-tach', tacky-cardia. I mean gimme a break. I'm sorry but the fake blood, fake body parts, fake killing and murdering all have their place but if a show wants a lighter take on living, outside of Vegas, Miami and LA with fewer guns, more food, flirting, and dating and then what's not to like? I wish them many happy returns. 

Hart of Dixie definitely deserves a second and third season as far as I'm concerned. I think the show has plenty of material to explore with relationships, farce & fancy and the fish out of water element. I really hope it gets renewed.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":49924,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7,"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2011-09-26","keywords":"fish out of water,doctor,female doctor,small town,female protagonist","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1377375/","name":"Rachel Bilson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0454809/","name":"Jaime King","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0930317/","name":"Cress Williams"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0299663/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005035/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1771570/","name":"Leila Gerstein"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Hart Of Dixie","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2390932761","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2U5M2VlNzYtZGExOS00NzhjLTk1NzMtOTIzYTkwZjNkMDU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2U5M2VlNzYtZGExOS00NzhjLTk1NzMtOTIzYTkwZjNkMDU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Hart Of Dixie"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Jack Reacher
Jack Reacher
programme.desc:
Jack Reacher: Directed by Christopher McQuarrie. With Tom Cruise, Rosamund Pike, Richard Jenkins, David Oyelowo. A homicide investigator digs deeper into a case involving a trained military sniper who shot five random victims." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0790724/","name":"Jack Reacher","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM1NjUxMDI3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjg1ODM3OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homicide investigator digs deeper into a case involving a trained military sniper who shot five random victims.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0790724/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Jack_LesCamela"},"dateCreated":"2012-12-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"JACK REACHER: Action movie-making done right!","reviewBody":"Saw JACK REACHER on Monday night at an advance screening. Here's some of my thoughts. There are no spoilers.

First off, I'd say I agree with the general critical reception: 4/5 stars. To me that means it's a solid movie that delivers at the high end of its genre. JACK REACHER isn't trying to be anything revolutionary, it's more the kind of action thriller audiences haven't seen for a while.

This isn't MISSION: IMPOSSIBLE or even James Bond. Writer/director Christopher McQuarrie takes his inspiration from action movies of the late 60s/early 70s like DIRTY HARRY (which has been name checked in a couple reviews already), BULLITT (for the car chase); and maybe another Don Siegel movie, CHARLEY VARRICK. The excitement here doesn't come from over the top stunts or huge explosions. Like the action movies just referenced, you thrill to watching a strongly defined protagonist outsmart, outfight and outmaneuver the bad guys.

Which brings me to the character of Jack Reacher and the casting of Tom Cruise. In the series of novels by Lee Child this movie is based on, Jack Reacher is an ex-MP detective. After a lifetime spent on military bases overseas, he lives as a drifter in the United States who adheres to a life of zero commitments: No house, no job, no car, no possessions, no family. Oh, and he stands 6'5" and weighs 250 lbs.

Clearly Tom Cruise doesn't match that physical description. What makes Reacher such a great character in Child's books though has far less to do with his exterior than it does with his intellect. If you've read the series as I have, it's a little strange at first. As the film played out however, I got more relaxed and more into it. This was definitely a movie about Lee Child's hero Jack Reacher, physical differences be damned.

Would I have preferred an unknown actor closer to Child's description to play Reacher on screen? Yes, of course. But I could say that about virtually any character, and often do. I generally want unknowns for everything.

Which is where Cruise's casting comes in handy a bit. Because his casting sort of guarantees a certain amount of box office, it means the filmmakers can take more chances. Like crafting an action movie that's longer on character and occasional brutal violence and short on mindless action and impossible nonsense.

JACK REACHER was a very satisfying action thriller for me. I felt it captured what I love about Lee Child's thrillers and Jack Reacher in particular. I'd definitely recommend it, and I'm going to see it in the theater again. That's for damn sure.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":321876,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2012-12-26","keywords":"sniper,coma,quarry,pittsburgh pennsylvania,heads knocked together","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"U.S. Version #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1158194201","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI2NzA4NjU0NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDM4MzI2OA@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI2NzA4NjU0NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDM4MzI2OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homicide investigator digs deeper into a case involving a trained military sniper who shot five random victims.
"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000129/","name":"Tom Cruise"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0683253/","name":"Rosamund Pike"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0420955/","name":"Richard Jenkins"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003160/","name":"Christopher McQuarrie"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0152219/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0769768/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1676193/","name":"Lee Child"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003160/","name":"Christopher McQuarrie"}],"duration":"PT2H10M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Stepmom
Pomajka
programme.desc:
Stepmom: Directed by Chris Columbus. With Julia Roberts, Susan Sarandon, Ed Harris, Jena Malone. A terminally-ill woman must deal with her ex-husband's new lover, who will be their children's stepmother." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0120686/","name":"Stepmom","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGJlOWM3ODctZjY3NC00YmRjLTg0NjgtNTFhOWQ4YzI4YjU3L2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A terminally-ill woman must deal with her ex-husband's new lover, who will be their children's stepmother.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0120686/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"gbheron"},"dateCreated":"1999-08-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Insulting and Manipulative","reviewBody":"For about the first half-hour of so Stepmom holds great promise. A year after successful middle-aged lawyer (Harris) divorces wife (Sarandon) we find him sharing his two school age kids and living with much younger beauty (Roberts). The tension is palpable; between husband and ex-wife, between kids and girlfriend, and especially between ex-wife and girlfriend. I thought this was going to be great, just bring it on home.

Then the wings fall off, and the movie craters into the ground. It's almost as if the writers and director were given the first half-hour of the movie, and told "now go finish the movie, but make it unwatchable". Because that is what happens; the remaining hour of the movie is a painful flogging.

The plot and dialogue are unpredictable only in their unbelievability. Does this stuff really happen? Do divorced, unemployed single mothers live in mansions, drive high-end automobiles, and own horses? Do writers and directors feel the need to string out multiple confessional scenes so they take up the last third of the movie? Is this supposed to be entertaining? Enlightening? What is going on here? No, better yet, get me out of here!

Pity the poor actors, they give it their best, but this movie is a depressing loser."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":64123,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"1999-04-14","keywords":"cancer,custody,rapunzel character,singing along,singing girl","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Stepmom","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1888157977","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTVmM2I2M2ItMTliOS00ZDI0LTg0ZTMtZWY2YzQyOTU4YzQxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTVmM2I2M2ItMTliOS00ZDI0LTg0ZTMtZWY2YzQyOTU4YzQxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Columbia Tristar"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000210/","name":"Julia Roberts"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000215/","name":"Susan Sarandon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000438/","name":"Ed Harris"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001060/","name":"Chris Columbus"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005883/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046151/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0505144/","name":"Gigi Levangie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0625458/","name":"Jessie Nelson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0737216/","name":"Steven Rogers"}],"duration":"PT2H5M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
U 3:10 za Yumu
programme.desc:
3:10 to Yuma: Directed by James Mangold. With Russell Crowe, Christian Bale, Logan Lerman, Dallas Roberts. A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0381849/","name":"3:10 to Yuma","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODE0NTcxNTQzNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzczOTIzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0381849/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"alexkolokotronis"},"dateCreated":"2008-02-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Modern Classic","reviewBody":"This is the best western since Unforgiven. Every aspect of this film is great. 

The acting was superb. Russell Crowe continues to give great and much overlooked performances. He delivers a great performance as outlaw Ben Wade. Crowe just keeps on putting me in shock with his spectacular performances. Crowe brought a mystique to his role that would of fit in with the old westerns. He seems as if he play anything and was a joy to watch here. He needs to be given much more and was definitely worthy of an Oscar nomination. Christain Bale also gives as a surprise to me a great performance as Dan Evans. He is on the verge of losing everything he's got. Bale displays his desperation and his willingness to feel that he has a purpose in life. He is definitely turning into a very good all around actor. I think he also deserved an Oscar nomination. Peter Fonda and Ben Foster also give very solid performances in their supporting roles. 

I have heard some people say that this western was to talky but I don't believe so. I think this was filled with great dialog and was engaging for the length of the movie.

The directing by James Mangold was probably the best I have seen from him. He was able to bring back the old western style but yet mix it together with a modern effects and etc. He did not fall into the trap of making it boring or to violent. He carried the movie all the way through keeping the viewer entertained. The cinematography was amazing. The sceneries were spectacular and many of the shooting scenes were delivered with such excellence with the acting, directing but the cinematography brought those scenes and this movie to another level. The music was great as well. It did not become cliché but instead made you feel like you were back watching Clint Eastwood, Gary Cooper or John Wayne. It just captured me like no other western has in a while.

programme.review: --- Actors: Russell Crowe (role=Ben Wade), Christian Bale (role=Dan Evans), Logan Lerman (role=William Evans), Dallas Roberts (role=Grayson Butterfield), Ben Foster (role=Charlie Prince), Peter Fonda (role=Byron McElroy), Vinessa Shaw (role=Emma Nelson), Alan Tudyk (role=Doc Potter), Luce Rains (role=Marshal Weathers), Gretchen Mol (role=Alice Evans), Lennie Loftin (role=Glen Hollander), Rio Alexander (role=Campos)

IMDb data; ttnr: 0381849, Title: 3:10 to Yuma, --- Description: 3:10 to Yuma: Directed by James Mangold. With Russell Crowe, Christian Bale, Logan Lerman, Dallas Roberts. A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0381849/","name":"3:10 to Yuma","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODE0NTcxNTQzNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzczOTIzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0381849/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"alexkolokotronis","dateCreated":"2008-02-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Modern Classic","reviewBody":"This is the best western since Unforgiven. Every aspect of this film is great. 

The acting was superb. Russell Crowe continues to give great and much overlooked performances. He delivers a great performance as outlaw Ben Wade. Crowe just keeps on putting me in shock with his spectacular performances. Crowe brought a mystique to his role that would of fit in with the old westerns. He seems as if he play anything and was a joy to watch here. He needs to be given much more and was definitely worthy of an Oscar nomination. Christain Bale also gives as a surprise to me a great performance as Dan Evans. He is on the verge of losing everything he's got. Bale displays his desperation and his willingness to feel that he has a purpose in life. He is definitely turning into a very good all around actor. I think he also deserved an Oscar nomination. Peter Fonda and Ben Foster also give very solid performances in their supporting roles. 

I have heard some people say that this western was to talky but I don't believe so. I think this was filled with great dialog and was engaging for the length of the movie.

The directing by James Mangold was probably the best I have seen from him. He was able to bring back the old western style but yet mix it together with a modern effects and etc. He did not fall into the trap of making it boring or to violent. He carried the movie all the way through keeping the viewer entertained. The cinematography was amazing. The sceneries were spectacular and many of the shooting scenes were delivered with such excellence with the acting, directing but the cinematography brought those scenes and this movie to another level. The music was great as well. It did not become cliché but instead made you feel like you were back watching Clint Eastwood, Gary Cooper or John Wayne. It just captured me like no other western has in a while. 

This movie is truly a modern classic.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":298577,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2008-03-12","keywords":"outlaw,arizona territory,based on short story,outlaw gang,contention city arizona","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"3:10 to Yuma","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2880504089","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA4MTYxNzUxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwODEzMjYy._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA4MTYxNzUxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwODEzMjYy._V1_.jpg","description":"3:10 to Yuma - Trailer","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000128/","name":"Russell Crowe","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000288/","name":"Christian Bale","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004936/","name":"Ben Foster"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003506/","name":"James Mangold"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0173285/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0131022/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0919925/","name":"Halsted Welles","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0104973/","name":"Michael Brandt","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0351929/","name":"Derek Haas"],"duration":"PT2H2M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Sense and Sensibility
Razum i osjećaji
programme.desc: Sense and Sensibility: Directed by Ang Lee. With James Fleet, Tom Wilkinson, Harriet Walter, Kate Winslet. Rich Mr. Dashwood dies, leaving his second wife and her three daughters poor by the rules of inheritance. The two eldest daughters are the title opposites." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0114388/","name":"Sense and Sensibility","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzk1MjU3MDQyMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjc1OTM2MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Rich Mr. Dashwood dies, leaving his second wife and her three daughters poor by the rules of inheritance. The two eldest daughters are the title opposites.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0114388/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sharkey197"},"dateCreated":"2005-08-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"jaded seniors","reviewBody":"It's not easy to get seniors to do anything, even watch a movie and when you mention Jane Austen, they zone out. Yet each year when we do this film in class, about 80 percent end up loving it and that includes the guys. It's wonderful to watch them respond to the characters and get into a film that is so "talky" when they have been used to high action. To hear the girls call Willoughby a jerk and applaud Brandon at the end is great, but to listen to the boys comment on the behavior of the various characters is even better. How they respond to a society so filled with strict manners and codes of behavior also makes this film worthwhile and it generates much discussion about the importance of money in life; well, even Thompson in the commentary said the film is about money, who has it and who does not. I love showing this film to my students; after the groans when I start it on the first day, it's wonderful to hear their comments on day five when we finish. As one senior male said this year, "I wouldn't have rented this or wanted to see it, but now that I have, I admit it was pretty good, so I'm glad you showed it." This is why they are classics, kiddies.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":109612,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"1996-01-26","keywords":"england,19th century,based on novel,black hair,visit","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [EN","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3393634073","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmQxZTE5YzUtMGZmMi00ZGNkLWE0NGMtN2EzZTI2YzVlMjQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmQxZTE5YzUtMGZmMi00ZGNkLWE0NGMtN2EzZTI2YzVlMjQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000668/","name":"Emma Thompson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000701/","name":"Kate Winslet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0281424/","name":"James Fleet"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000487/","name":"Ang Lee"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0038270/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000807/","name":"Jane Austen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000668/","name":"Emma Thompson"}],"duration":"PT2H16M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra
G. I. Joe: Kobrin uzlet
programme.desc:
G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra: Directed by Stephen Sommers. With Adewale Akinnuoye-Agbaje, Christopher Eccleston, Grégory Fitoussi, Joseph Gordon-Levitt. An elite military unit comprised of special operatives known as G.I. Joe, operating out of The Pit, takes on an evil organization led by a notorious arms dealer." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1046173/","name":"G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQzMTU1NzQwNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDg4NzMzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An elite military unit comprised of special operatives known as G.I. Joe, operating out of The Pit, takes on an evil organization led by a notorious arms dealer.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1046173/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"faija-1"},"dateCreated":"2009-09-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Fun movie - not even close to realistic, but fun.","reviewBody":"Let me first say that I knew absolutely nothing about the GI Joe franchise except that they were (are?) toys. But that did not hinder me from enjoying this movie.

What do you get if you mix a few parts James Bond, a few parts Transformers and a few parts Star Wars? Well, you get G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra! Basically, if you like the aforementioned movies you will probably enjoy this one. Things explode constantly, shiny things glimmer past the screen and hot chicks in tight outfits show up now and then.

If you are the type who crave realism in your movies then do not - I repeat, do not see this one. Realism does not even come within shooting distance of this movie. But if you can enjoy a popcorn summer movie then this is not a bad way to spend an afternoon.

And yes - there is a Wayans brother in this, but strangely enough, he did not annoy me...","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":204833,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2009-09-23","keywords":"gi joe,swat team,2000s,destruction,iceberg","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"G.I. programme.title: The Godfather: Part III
Kum 3
programme.desc: The Godfather: Part III: Directed by Francis Ford Coppola. With Al Pacino, Diane Keaton, Talia Shire, Andy Garcia. Follows Michael Corleone, now in his 60s, as he seeks to free his family from crime and find a suitable successor to his empire." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0099674/","name":"The Godfather: Part III","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWFlYWY2YjYtNjdhNi00MzVlLTg2MTMtMWExNzg4NmM5NmEzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDk5Mzc5MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follows Michael Corleone, now in his 60s, as he seeks to free his family from crime and find a suitable successor to his empire.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0099674/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MR_Heraclius"},"dateCreated":"2020-02-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not as good as the first 2","reviewBody":"Definitely not my favorite of the 3 but it's hard when the first 2 were just that good. It still portrays well, from my historical knowledge, much of the struggle of the mob families to legitimize their business dealings and try to enjoy life in the later age of the mafia in America. Al Pacino performs brilliantly and I enjoyed Joe Mantegna in his roll. Definitely worth the watch if you were a fan of the previous 2 films.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":376212,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"1990-12-25","keywords":"opera,gangster,catholic church,violence,organized crime","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1237827865","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDYyZmQyMjMtMGQyMS00YjYwLWIxZWEtMzQ0ODNlYzFkM2YyXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDYyZmQyMjMtMGQyMS00YjYwLWIxZWEtMzQ0ODNlYzFkM2YyXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","description":"See the never-before-seen version of the final film, The #GodfatherCoda: The Death of Michael Corleone. programme.title: 28 Days
28 dana
programme.desc:
28 Days: Directed by Betty Thomas. With Sandra Bullock, Viggo Mortensen, Dominic West, Elizabeth Perkins. A big-city newspaper columnist is forced to enter a drug and alcohol rehab center after ruining her sister's wedding and crashing a stolen limousine." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0191754/","name":"28 Days","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDlkMmE5ZTEtNTA0YS00OTBjLTgyYmEtMGExMzJkOTRjNDg4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A big-city newspaper columnist is forced to enter a drug and alcohol rehab center after ruining her sister's wedding and crashing a stolen limousine.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0191754/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"stephen_thanabalan_fans"},"dateCreated":"2006-03-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Tipsily overindulges its themes","reviewBody":"There is a a very important message at the heart of this Betty Thomas film: Self Control from Indulgent excesses. The problem: the film itself tipsily overindulges its themes by balancing good drama with over-acting and imbalanced doses of comedy. 

In a sense, the film knew it was dealing with touchy subject matter when it highlighted the realities of rehab in NY, but why did it need to purposefully throw in the stereotypical comedic archetypes - the viking accented Alan Tursdysk, or O'Malley's strapdown one liners, or for that matter, the debonair English accented intelligent metro lover in Dom West? Perhaps it was in 2000, and you needed to sell films that way to appeal to their target audience of teenagers who did weed and drank too much, but the fact is, when you have Steve Buscemi, Sandra Bullock and Viggo Mortensen in a film you can afford to push the drama-reality envelope and go in that direction. 

In fact, the film's best moments are when Thomas does this- in a series of flashbacks to let the audience get in sync and depth with Bullock's character. And, there are scenes where the comedy can be done appropriately and in concordance with the film's thematic content- such as the skit at the end for Azura Skye's character. Sadly, these good moves are coupled with some really tipsy flaws, including the ending where Mortensen's character meets the soap star. Bullock's character also undergoes way too quick a character change (for 28 days) if one was to really nitpick.

However, the themes in this film make this a film i would still recommend to youth and young people. Azura Skye's character's loneliness, depression and suicide are genuinely depicted, and the fragile and important message of hope and redemption amid the perfunctory nature of life in the rehab centre that are celebrated in the plot really help this film regain its footing. When Bullock's character realises that this (the pills and drugs) was not a way to live, and Mortensen addresses her insecurities of not being able to do a single thing right, the film touches significant depths and strikes the chords of viewers. My personal favourite was the scene were Lizzy Perkins' character acknowledges the flaws of hers and her sister's lives and establishes love and hope in reconciliation. You see, it is the film's ability to reach such levels that I know this film suffered from tipsily overindulging its themes-trying to tie in too much to everyone- from being a comedy to a drama.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":47462,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2000-07-05","keywords":"wedding,rehabilitation,triple f rated,f rated,sister sister relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"28 Days","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2301297433","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmUxMWI1ZTUtNTk1OC00YzZhLWFiMzctMTA2ZTgyYjJkNjhhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmUxMWI1ZTUtNTk1OC00YzZhLWFiMzctMTA2ZTgyYjJkNjhhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Columbia Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000113/","name":"Sandra Bullock"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001557/","name":"Viggo Mortensen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0922035/","name":"Dominic West"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0858525/","name":"Betty Thomas"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0089889/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0335666/","name":"Susannah Grant"}],"duration":"PT1H43M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: June in January
Siječanjsko vjenčanje
programme.desc: June in January: Directed by Mark Griffiths. With Brooke D'Orsay, Wes Brown, Marilu Henner, Gerard Plunkett. A newly engaged bride's dream wedding is threatened by her scheming future mother-in-law, when a sudden change in plans pushes her perfect outdoor June wedding up to a wintry January date." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3354866/","name":"June in January","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAwNzEwNDc3Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjU0MzU3NDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A newly engaged bride's dream wedding is threatened by her scheming future mother-in-law, when a sudden change in plans pushes her perfect outdoor June wedding up to a wintry January date.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3354866/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Jackbv123"},"dateCreated":"2017-01-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not the usual romance movie but that's not enough","reviewBody":"When I saw that Brooke D'Orsay was the star, I was excited because I thought she was a powerful character in Royal Pains. And as the movie started out, it looked like this would be another chance to see a wonderful woman similar to Paige from Royal Pains. But the movie was boring. Most of it was about wedding planning. There was an attempt to set up a daughter-in-law/mother-in-law conflict. But that conflict was muddled. There are other details I didn't like, but expanding on them gives away too much. In some ways this was not your typical Hallmark movie. There were no competing love interests and the leads started out in love (having had a two year uninterrupted relationship). The male lead was a virtual non-entity. I don't blame D'Orsay for the shortcomings because I think she did the best she could with the script.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":977,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-01-11","keywords":"nursing practitioner,lawyer,mother son relationship,marriage proposal,new year's eve party","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"June in January","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1333505561","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGYyMDM0ZDQtNmIxNy00MWY3LThiOGItMTI5ODhkN2UxNTA4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGYyMDM0ZDQtNmIxNy00MWY3LThiOGItMTI5ODhkN2UxNTA4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for June in January"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1175262/","name":"Brooke D'Orsay"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1734202/","name":"Wes Brown"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000447/","name":"Marilu Henner"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0341716/","name":"Mark Griffiths"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0197380/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0457285/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0008899/","name":"Jean Abounader"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0924896/","name":"J.B. White"}],"duration":"PT1H27M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: You Got Served
Ulični ples
programme.desc: You Got Served: Directed by Chris Stokes. With Omarion, Marques Houston, Jennifer Freeman, Jarell Houston. In order to achieve their dream of opening a recording studio, two friends (Omarion, Houston) must first win their city's dance contest -- a fierce competition that pits them against a group of tough street dancers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0365957/","name":"You Got Served","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjkzZWZjZmMtMjliYi00Zjg5LTkzZGYtYzZkOGNhNzc5MzQxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"In order to achieve their dream of opening a recording studio, two friends (Omarion, Houston) must first win their city's dance contest -- a fierce competition that pits them against a group of tough street dancers.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0365957/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"enirehtac8"},"dateCreated":"2004-10-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"a painful experience","reviewBody":"Seeing this movie was a painful experience!!!!! all i can say is "i got served!". The plot just seemed like some teenager's badly thought through daydream. The story line was a mess seeming to be made of ideas randomly taken from every cheesy teenage movie ever made. The acting was terrible, as was the script. The writers seemed to believe that to make it authentic "street" talk words such as "you'll", "whack" and "homeboy" had to be inserted thrice in every line. Every character seems to be created from the same cardboard cut-out stereo type, including all peripheral characters, such as the doctors and nurses. The only positive things i can say about the movie is that the dancing was wonderfully choreographed and performed and the music was new and fresh. In order to achieve their dream of opening a recording studio, two friends (Omarion, Houston) must first win their city's dance contest -- a fierce competition that pits them against a group of tough street dancers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0365957/","name":"You Got Served","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjkzZWZjZmMtMjliYi00Zjg5LTkzZGYtYzZkOGNhNzc5MzQxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"In order to achieve their dream of opening a recording studio, two friends (Omarion, Houston) must first win their city's dance contest -- a fierce competition that pits them against a group of tough street dancers.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0365957/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"enirehtac8","dateCreated":"2004-10-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"a painful experience","reviewBody":"Seeing this movie was a painful experience!!!!! all i can say is "i got served!". The plot just seemed like some teenager's badly thought through daydream. The story line was a mess seeming to be made of ideas randomly taken from every cheesy teenage movie ever made. The acting was terrible, as was the script. The writers seemed to believe that to make it authentic "street" talk words such as "you'll", "whack" and "homeboy" had to be inserted thrice in every line. Every character seems to be created from the same cardboard cut-out stereo type, including all peripheral characters, such as the doctors and nurses. The only positive things i can say about the movie is that the dancing was wonderfully choreographed and performed and the music was new and fresh. The grandmother (who appears for about 5 minuets) was the best character in the movie, the actress, Esther Scott, did very well with the dreadful script and actually made the movie enjoyable, at least for a minuet.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":27625,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.9,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2004-01-30","keywords":"reference to 'nsync,bare midriff,dance movie,friend,competition","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"You Got Served","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2382299417","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzAzMzg3MDEtYTMwNS00ODFhLWJmOGItOTg5YzkzMmMxMTk4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzAzMzg3MDEtYTMwNS00ODFhLWJmOGItOTg5YzkzMmMxMTk4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1217506/","name":"Omarion","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1216791/","name":"Jarell Houston","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1215800/","name":"Raz B"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0831321/","name":"Chris Stokes"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010568/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0120116/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0109181/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0831321/","name":"Chris Stokes"],"duration":"PT1H35M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Shpengimi: I jashtëligjshmi i fundit
programme.desc: Lans Henriksen, Tom Bergner. I plakur dhe i sëmurë, famëkeqi Tailon Flin kërkon t'i rregullojë disa gabime para së të vdesë. Por, kur mëson ç'jetë bën e bija që braktisi, ai i rikthehet zakoneve të vjetra për ta shpëtuar.
programme.category: Aksion
uestern

programme.title: Qyteti i merimangave
programme.desc: Një stacion i vjetër sovjetik hapësinor bie në tunelin e metrosë në Nju Jork. Bashkë me të, vijnë nga hapësira një specie merimangash helmuese, që shpejt do të ndryshojnë përmasa dhe të gjithë do të jënë në rrezik.
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkencë

programme.title: Beteja e të mallkuarve
programme.desc: Dolph Lundgren, Matt Doran, Lydia Look. Pas një virusi që i kthen njerëzit në zombi, një ushtar privat vihet në krye të disa të mbijetuarve dhe disa robotëve, në përpjekje për të eliminuar rrezikun...
programme.category: Fantashkencë

programme.title: Britmë e largët
programme.desc: Til Schweiger. Bazuar në një nga video-lojërat më të shitura. Dy gazetarë, hetojnë vdekjet misterioze të rekrutëve në një ishull, ku dyshohet se po zhvillohen super - ushtarë të pashkatërrueshëm.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Dalja
programme.desc: 2019. Kur Seuli kërcënohet nga një katastrofë, i riu më i dështuar i qytetit do të tregohet hero.\t\t.
programme.category: Kinemaja aziatike

programme.title: Mijëra kilometra mes jetës dhe vdekjes
programme.desc: Për një ushtar amerikan të Luftës së Dytë botërore, tmerret e luftës kundër nazistëve nuk kanë përfunduar, edhe pse ai është kthyer në shtëpi...
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Hapësira e bardhë
programme.desc: Kapiteni i një anije hapësinore merr një vendim të guximshëm: të gjuajë për një specie aliene të rrallë e të rrezikshme. Fiksimi i tij e shtyn anijen thellë në hapësirë, ndërsa ekuipazhi endet mes tradhtive dhe rebelimit.
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkencë

programme.title: Zhdukja
programme.desc: 2018. Michael Peña, Lizzy Caplan. I përndjekur nga ëndrrat e një pushtimi alien, një burrë familjar përballet me makthin e tij më të keq kur një forcë jashtëtokësore fillon të shfarosë banorët e Tokës.
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkencë

programme.title: Kërcyesi
programme.desc: Kërcyesit janë qenie që jetojne me njerezit në botën moderne, por aftesia e tyre per te kercyer nga një cep në cepin tjeter të globit, s'pranohet nga paladinet, mbrojtesit fanatike te fese qe kane nisur prej shekujsh fushaten e shfarosjes se tyre.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Në kohë
programme.desc: Justin Timberlake, Amanda Seyfried. Në të ardhmen e afërt, kur askush nuk plaket mbi 25 vjeç, të pasurit jetojnë përgjithmonë duke blerë kohë, ndërsa të varfërit duhet të gjejnë mënyra të tjera për të jetuar çdo ditë dhe çdo sekondë...
programme.category: Aksion
fantazi

programme.title: Veterani
programme.desc: Toby Kebbell, Adi Bielski. Pasi kthehet nga lufta në Afganistan, një njeri zbulon një komplot të frikshëm, ku përfshihen agjentë të qeverisë dhe disa kriminelë të pashpirt...
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Ultraviolet
programme.desc: 2006. M.Jovovich. Një semundje që provokon një mutacion gjenetik po gjeneron një race të re njerezore; më e fortë dhe me inteligjente. E trembur nga epersia e tyre, qeveria kërkon t'i asgjesoje. Një grua ngjyre vjollce vendos t'u dale per zot.
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkence

programme.title: Piratët e Karaibeve 2
programme.desc: Regjia: Gore Verinski. Aktorët: Johnny Depp, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightely. Xhek Sparrou,do të vihet në ndjekje të zemrës së Dejvid Xhonsit, në mënyrë që të mos mbetet përjetësisht i robëruar prej tij...
programme.category: Action Superheroes

programme.title: Lojërat Xhurasik
programme.desc: Dhjetë të burgosur, të dënuar me vdekje, detyrohen të marrin pjesë në një lojë virtuale që i vendos kundër dinozaurve dhe kundër njëri-tjetrit. Fituesi mund të jetë vetëm një, por kush vdes në lojë, vdes edhe në realitet.
programme.category: Aksion
horror
fantashkencë

programme.title: Lindja e dragoit
programme.desc: Philip Ng, Yu Xia. Bazuar në historinë e vërtetë të dyluftimit midis Bruce Lee dhe murgut shaolin Wong Jack Man, në vitet 1960. Një dyluftim që e ktheu Bruce Lee në një legjendë të arteve marciale.
programme.category: Arte marciale
aksion

programme.title: Dosjet Kein
programme.desc: Drew Fuller, William Atherton. Pasi arratiset nga burgu, një njeri kërkon hakmarrje kundër gangsterit që e do të vdekur me çdo kusht.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Drejtësi vdekjeprurëse
programme.desc: S.Seagal, M. Ory. Polici Kane dhe skuadra e tij, përballen me një gjeneratë të re kriminelësh, një shoqëri raciste e quajtur 'Shpresa e Re'. Ndërkohë prokurorja e përgjithshme përpiqet të vendosë pas hekurave një përdhunues serial.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Gangsteri, polici dhe Djalli
programme.desc: Bazuar në histori të vërtetë. Jetët e një vrasësi serial, një gangsteri dhe një polici në Korenë e Jugut, ndërthuren dhunshëm kur gangsteri i shpëton sulmit të hidhur të vrasësit dhe bashkëpunon me policin për tu hakmarrë.
programme.category: Kinemaja aziatike

programme.title: Shpërthim në Los Anxhelos
programme.desc: Një skenarist në krizë, një sizmiolog dhe një yll hollivudi duhet të bashkëpunojë për të qetësuar vullkanët që po shpërthejnë kudo nëpë Los Anxhelos, përpara se qyteti të shkatërrohet nga një shpërthim final.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Terror në hapësirë
programme.desc: Scott Adkins. Stacioni hapësior ndërkombëtar është kthyer nëburg sekret. Kur një nga të burgosurit arrin të dalë nga qelia, plani i tij për të marrë kontorllinvështirësohet nga një agjent, që ka të tjera planepër stacionin dhe të burgosurit.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Në gjueti për të vrarë
programme.desc: Steve Austin, Eric Roberts. Një grup të arratisurish, marrin peng një agjent të kufirit dhe vajzën e tij adoleshente dhe fshihen në pyll. Por instinkti për mbijetesë do ta bëjë agjentin të fillojë gjuetinë e hakmarrjes...
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Vrasja e fundit
programme.desc: 2020. Një specialist për mbrojtjen e personave, pranon një punë të fundit para se të tërhiqet nga profesioni i tij. Por, detyra e përmbyllëse do të kërkojë të gjithë përvojën e tij për të mbajtur të gjallë personat në ngarkim.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Panik total
programme.desc: Analisti i CIA-s Jack Ryan vihet ne ndjekje te nje grupi terrorristesh te cilet projektojne te shperthejne nje pajisje berthamore ne Superbowl.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Plan arratie 2
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone, 50 Cent. Vite pasi luftoi të dilte nga burgu i paarratisshëm, Rei drejton nje ndër grupet më të mira të sigurisë së lartë. Kur një prej antarëve të tij zhduket, atij i duhet të kthehet tek ferri nga i cili u arratis.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Njerëz të zakonshëm
programme.desc: Pasi fillon punë si mësues fizkulture në gjimnazin e një qyteti të qetë rural, një ish - trajner boksi përfshihet në rastin e zhdukjes së një nxënëseje, që çuditërisht nuk shqetëson vendasit dhe autoritetet.
programme.category: Aksion
krim

programme.title: Misioni antiterror
programme.desc: 2019. Në ekip ndërkombëtar ushtarësh elitarë nga SHBA-ja, Rusia, Mbretëria e Bashkuar, Kina dhe Franca bashkojnë forcat për të neutralizuar një grup të ri ekstremist që po shkakton terror në Lindjen e Mesme.
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Vjedhje ne Itali
programme.desc: Nje bande hajdutesh me ne krye Charlie Croker-in, realizon nje vjedhje spetakolare ne Itali. Por, dikush do t'jua marre trofene rruges dhe gjithcka zhvendoset ne Los Anxhelos...
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Drejtpërdrejt nga Bagdadi
programme.desc: M.Keaton, H.B. Carter, L.Taylor. Kandidat për 3 Globe të Arte. Lufta e Gjirit Persik, 1991. Janë përpjekjet e pareshtura të një grupi gazetarësh të kanalit televiziv CNN për të pasqyruar direkt luftën pa marrë parasysh rreziqet që sjell ajo.
programme.category: Bazuar në një histori të vërtetë

programme.title: 10 gjëra rreth nesh
programme.desc: Morgan Freeman, Paz Vega. Duke u përgatitur për një rol, një aktor dikur i famshëm, takohet me një punëtore supermarketi dhe brenda një dite të vetme, secili prej tyre zbulon gjëra rreth njëri tjetrit dhe vetes, që do t'ju ndryshojnë jetën.
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Më do, s'më do
programme.desc: Imran Khan, Genelia D'Souza. Një djalë dhe një vajzë, shumë të ndryshëm nga njëri tjetri, janë edhe miq të pandarë dhe të gjithë që i njohin mendojnë se do të ishin çifti perfekt. A mundet që miqësia të kthehet në dashuri?
programme.category: Një histori Indie

programme.title: Motra e motrës tënde
programme.desc: Mark Duplass, Rosemarie DeWitt, Emily Blunt. Një njeri, kalon një natë pasionante me motrën e shoqes së tij më të mirë. Një vendim që do të sjellë komplikime të paparashikuara.
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Ondina
programme.desc: Colin Farrell, Alicja Bachleda. Një peshkatar irlandez zbulon se në rrjeta ka kapur një vajzë të bukur, për të cilën e bija beson se është një krijesë mitike e detit që mund të marrë formë njerëzore...
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Martesa
programme.desc: Jeta e Herrit ndodhet në udhëkryq. Gruan e tij besnike, por të ftohtë e ka të pamundur ta dashurojë. I marrosur pas një tjetre dhe për t'ia kursyer së shoqes poshtërimin e divorcit, ai vendos t'i japë fund martesës në një mënyrë tjetër.
programme.category: Portret familjar

programme.title: Australia
programme.desc: Nicole Kidman, Hugh Jackman. Në Australinë e para Luftës së Dytë Botërore, një aristokrate angleze ndihmohet nga një rritës bagëtish, për të mbrojtur pronën e saj nga rreziqet që i kanosen.
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Dashuri dhe urrejtje
programme.desc: Kristen Wiig, Guy Pearce, Hailee Steinfeld. Një grua e ndrojtur, mendon se po bie në dashuri me babain e një adoleshenteje për të cilën po kujdeset, por në të vëtetë është futur në kurth nga vajza.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Xhimi P.
programme.desc: Benicio del Toro, Mathieu Amalric. Bazuar në histori të vërtetë. Miqësia e veçantë që lindi mes indianit veteran të Luftës II Botërore dhe psikoanalistit francez, gjatë seancave psikoterapike për të zbuluar arsyen e shqetësimeve të tij.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Moonlight mile
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal, Dustin Hoffman, Susan Sarandon. Për t'u përballur sa më lehtë me vdekjen e të dashurës, një i ri shkon të jetojë me prindërit e saj, por aty do të gjejë diçka shumë më të bukur se sa paqja shpirtërore.
programme.category: Portret familjar

programme.title: Tuskaluza
programme.desc: Alabama, 1972. I sapodiplomuari Billi dashurohet me një paciente ndërsa punon në spitalin psikiatrik të drejtuar nga i ati, i cili ka lidhje me pushtetin. Por kur miku i tij përfshihet në një lëvizje të të drejtave civile kundër elitës drejtuese, ai vihet.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Pasione të papritura
programme.desc: Një gazetare ambicioze që po heton një skandal, e gjen veten në një dileme të madhe kur fillon të ketë ndjenja për djalin e pashëm, me të cilin u afrua vetëm sepse e sheh si të dyshuarin kryesor të çështjes.
programme.category: Dramë
romancë

programme.title: Gjysma ime
programme.desc: Troian Bellisario, Tom Felton. Pas një tragjedie të papritur, Olivia duhet të mësohet si të jetojë pa vëllanë e saj binjak, ose të testojë veten se ç'është e gatshme të bëjë për ta rikthyer.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Devdas
programme.desc: Prodhim i vitit 2002. Shahrukh Khan, Aishwarya Rai. Ngjarjet zhvillohen në Indinë e viteve 1900 dhe portretizojnë dashurinë a pakrahasueshme të dy të rinjve, të cilët u ndanë për shkak të diferencave në klasën shoqërore.
programme.category: Një histori Indie

programme.title: Mbyllja e rrethit
programme.desc: Shirley MacLaine, Christopher Plummer. Në 1943, një artiljer duke dhënë shpirt, i jep një vendasi një unazë për t'ia dorëzuar të dashurës në SHBA. Pesëdhjetë vjet më vonë, një burrë e gjen unazën dhe vendos të zbulojë historinë e saj...
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Qiell i kaltër
programme.desc: Projekti 'Qiell i kaltër' është misioni top sekret i majorit Henk Marshall. Por ka sekrete të cilat ai s'mund t'i mbajë dot fshehur. Fituese e Academy Awards, Jessica Lange. Fitues i Academy Awards, Tommy Lee Jones.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Xhoi
programme.desc: 2015. Jennifer Lawrence, Robert De Niro, Bradley Cooper. Historia e një familjeje përgjatë katër gjeneratave me në qendër një grua që përballë vështirësive dhe paragjykimeve arrin të bëhet një biznesmen e suksesshme...
programme.category: Biografi
komedi
dramë

programme.title: Mëkatet e brezave
programme.desc: Dy vëllezër të ndarë prej kohësh i bashkon dëshira e fundit e nënës së tyre. Përmbushja e amanetit i çon ata në një udhëtim me kujtime të errëta, që vëllai i vogël nuk i mban mënd dhe që i madhi dëshiron të mund t'i harronte....
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Billi dhe Tedi shpëtojnë universin
programme.desc: Keanu Reeves. Dekada pas aventurës së tyre të fundit, shokët e ngushtë Billi dhe Tedi, tashmë në moshë të mesme, nisin një tjetër aventurë kur një vizitor nga e ardhmja i paralajmëron se vetëm kënga e tyre mund të shpëtojë realitetin tonë...
programme.category: Komedi
fantashkencë

programme.title: 13 orë: ushtarët sekretë të Bengazit
programme.desc: John Krasinski, Pablo Schreiber. Bazuar në historinë e vërtetë të ngjarjeve tragjike të sulmit mbi ambasadën Amerikane në Libi dhe heroizmit të 6 agjentëve të sigurisë që bënë gjithçka për të shpëtuar njerëzit e mbetur...
programme.category: Biografi/Luftë

programme.title: Të luash me zjarrin
programme.desc: John Cena. Kur zjarrfikësi Jake Carson dhe ekipi i tij shpëtojnë tre fëmijë nga një zjarr i egër, ata kuptojnë shpejt se asnjë lloj trajnimi nuk mund t'i kishte përgatitur ata për punën e tyre më sfiduese: të bërit dadon.
programme.category: Komedi
familje

programme.title: Krishtlindja e parë
programme.desc: Salvatore Ficarra, Valentino Picone. Një hajdut ateist dhe një prift, transportohen si me magji në Palestinën e vitit zero, ku do të duhet të sigurohen që Lindja e Krishtit të ndjekë të njëjtën histori që njohim të gjithë.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Gringo: Një i huaj në qytet
programme.desc: J. Edgerton, Ch. Theron. Një biznesmen amerikan shkon në Meksikë që të mbikqyrë prodhimin e pilulës revolucionare të marjuanës. Kur rrëmbehet nga 1 bandë droge e mbetur pa punë, ai detyrohet të kthehet nga qytetar shembull, në kriminel i kërkuar.
programme.category: Aksion
komedi e zeze

programme.title: Kujdes nga Gorilla
programme.desc: Me Frank Matano, Cristiana Capotondi. Lorenzo, një avokat i divorcuar, për të rifituar respektin e fëmijëve të tij, e gjen veten duke bashkëjetuar me gorrillën Pepe.
programme.category: Komedi
familje

programme.title: Kulla e zezë
programme.desc: Idris Elba, Matthew McConaughey. Bazuar në librat bestseller të Stephen King. Rolandi, Pistoleri i fundit, ndodhet në një betejë të përjetshme me Njeriun me të zeza, i vendosur për ta ndaluar që të shkatërrojë Kullën e zezë, që bën të mundur ekziste.
programme.category: Aksion
fantazi

programme.title: Beteja për Tokën
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage. Çdo gjashtë vjet, një urdhër i lashtë i luftëtarëve ekspertë të disiplinës Jiu-Jitsu përballen me pushtuesit e një galaktikë tjetër. Por kur heroi i luftës Jake Barnes mposhtet, e ardhmja e njerëzimit varet në fije të perit.
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkencë

programme.title: Shtatë të mrekullueshmit
programme.desc: 2016. Denzel Washington, Chris Pratt. Kur një qytezë bie nën sundimin e një industrialisti të pamëshirshrëm, banorët punësojnë shtatë të jashtëligjshëm për t'i mbrojtur. Por ndërkohë që përgatiten për përballjen, ata e gjejnë veten duke luftuar jo ve.
programme.category: Western
aksion

programme.title: Një natë për qejf
programme.desc: Lisa Kudrow, Kaitlyn Dever, Beanie Feldstein. Emi dhe Molli kuptojnë se duhet të kishin mësuar më pak dhe të ishin argëtuar më shumë gjatë gjimnazit. Në prag të diplomimit, ato vendosin të festojnë brenda një nate, sa për 4 vjet gjimnazi...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Ne nje lagje te Nju Jorkut
Gjahtari i përbindëshave
programme.desc: Milla Jovovich. Kur togerja Artemis dhe njësia e saj elitare transportohen në këtë univers paralel, ata përfshihen në një betejë të dëshpëruar për mbijetesë kundër armiqve të stërmëdhenj me fuqi të pabesueshme.
programme.category: Aksion
aventurë
fantazi

programme.title: Klubi i vajzave që rrihen
programme.desc: Malin Akerman, Bella Thorne, Alec Baldwin. Ana po kalon periudhën me të keqe të jetës së saj. Po kur mikja e saj e prezanton me një klub të fshehtë dyluftimesh vetëm për femra, Ana vendos të marrë pjesë me shpresën për të fituar para.
programme.category: Aksion
komedi
dramë

programme.title: Alfa
programme.desc: Në të kaluarën parahistorike, një i ri përpiqet të kthehet në shtëpi pasi u nda nga fisi i tij gjatë një gjuetie. Ai gjen një ujk të plagosur e të braktisur dhe sëbashku fillojnë një miqësi që do të ndryshojë njerëzimin.
programme.category: Aventurë
histori

programme.title: Papijon
programme.desc: Charlie Hunnam, Rami Malek. Bazuar në histori të vërtetë. I dënuar gabimisht për vrajse, Henri Charriere lidh një aleancë të pazakontë me të dënuarin për falsifikim Luis Dega-n, në përpjekje për t'u arratisur nga burgu famëkeq në Ishullin e Djallit..
programme.category: Biografi
dramë

programme.title: Përpara se të iki
programme.desc: 12 shkurti, është thjesht një ditë tjetër për Samantën, derisa kuptohet se është dita e saj e fundit. E bllokuar për të ripërjetuar ditën e fundit, ajo duhet të zbulojë misterin e vdekjes dhe gjithçka që po humbet përpara se të iki.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Qëllimi i një qeni
programme.desc: Josh Gad, Dennis Quaid. Një qen përpiqet të kuptojë qëllimin e jetës së tij, përgjatë disa jetëve dhe me pronarë të ndryshëm.
programme.category: Komedi
dramë

programme.title: Gruaja që ecën përpara
programme.desc: Jessica Chastain. Piktorja Nju Jorkeze Catherine Weldon, udhëton drejt Dakotës në vitet 1880, për të pikturuar portretin një udhëheqësi të madh indian. Ajo do të bëhet përkrahëse e të drejtave të fisit indian dhe luftës për tokat e tyre.
programme.category: Dramë
biografi

programme.title: Malet mes nesh
programme.desc: Idris Elba, Kate Winslet. Të bllokuar në mal pas një aksidenti me avion, dy të panjohur bashkëpunojnë për t'i mbijetuar kushteve ekstreme të moti.
programme.category: Romancë
thriller
aventurë

programme.title: Vrasje në Orient Express
programme.desc: Kenneth Branagh, Penelope Cruz. Kur në trenin me të cilin ai po udhëton ndodh një vrasje, hetuesi i famshëm Herkul Puarot, përpiqet të gjejë vrasësin përpara se ai të veprojë sërish.
programme.category: Krim
mister

programme.title: Familja Peeples
programme.desc: Craig Robinson, Kerry Washington. Me shpresën për t'i propozuar për martesë të dashurës së tij të klasës së lartë, Ueid Uoker çorodit mbledhjen e përvitshme të familjes së saj dhe përballet drejtpërdrejt me babain e rreptë, gjykatësin Peeples.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Vajza e hakmarrjes
programme.desc: Një vajzë e zgjuar 24-vjeçare dashurohet pas një djali të pashëm nga një familje politikanësh, por pasi ai e braktis, ajo vendos të kandidojë si Kryeministre për t'u hakmarrë ndaj tij.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Martesë në Paris
programme.desc: 2011. Massimo Boldi, Biagio Izzo. Një biznesmen që e ka mendjen si e si të mos paguajë asnjë taksë dhe një taksambledhës i ndershëm, rastësisht takohen gjatë udhëtimit për në Paris, për të vizituar fëmijët e tyre, që ndajnë të njëjtin apartament.
programme.category: Komedia Italiane

programme.title: Fantoci në parajsë
programme.desc: Paolo Villaggio. Fati i keq nuk e lë të qetë Fantocin e gjorë dhe pas një sërë ngjarjesh ai do të përfundojë në botën tjetër... në parajsë. Por sigurisht që edhe këtu gjërat për të nuk ndryshojnë shumë nga jeta në tokë...
programme.category: Komedia Italiane

programme.title: Një princ për stinën e verës
programme.desc: Kur një princ, trashëgimtar froni dhe qejfli festash, kritikohet për sjelljen e tij, familja mbretërore punëson një këshilltare imazhi për të ndryshuar opinionin e përgjithshëm, por ajo do të bëjë me shumë se aq...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Ngritja dhe rënia e Fatalit
programme.desc: Fatali, është një muziknat i suksesshëm që duket sikur i ka të gjitha. Por në të vërtetë ai nuk e di as ku po shkon dhe as nga ka ardhur, sepse që në fillim ka gënjyer njerëzit për vendlindjen e tij.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Gruaja e shtepise
programme.desc: Nje dyshe komikesh te famshem, nje arkitekt dhe nje kamariere te cilet fillojne te sajojne perralla magjike mbi martesen e tyre te rreme, vetem per te zbuluar se ndoshta jo çdo gje eshte nje trillim.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Qyteti i frikës
programme.desc: Chantal Lauby, Alain Chabat. Një film i frikshëm pranohet në festivalin e Kanës, por sa herë bëhet gati për t'u shfaqur, projektuesi i filmit vritet me drapër dhe çekan, njësoj si në film.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Rruga e turpit
programme.desc: Elizabeth Banks. Pas një nate të shfrenuar, një gazetare zgjohet në një zonë të panjohur. Pa telefon dhe pa asnjë qindarkë në xhep, ajo bën gjithçka për të arritur në kohë në intervistën e punës së ëndrrave.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Teoria e derrit
programme.desc: Loren është një blogere që inkurajon komunitetin femëror të zbatojë "Teorinë e derrit": Të ndahen nga të dashurit brenda 6 muajve, sepse aq zgjat besnikëria e burrave. Por dikush sfidon teorinë e saj me një garë tunduese...
programme.category: Komedi
romancë

programme.title: Dashuri dhe telashe
programme.desc: Paula Patton, Laz Alonso. Sabrina dhe Xhejson, kanë vendosur të martohen. Të dy janë afroamerikanë, por familjet e tyre janë shumë ndryshe nga njëra-tjetra dhe kur ato takohen gjithçka kthehet përmbys...
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Zotëria i nderuar
programme.desc: Viti i prodhimit: 1992. Eddie Murphy. Një kriminel nga Florida shfrytëzon kartën e identitetit të një senatori me të cilin ndan të njejtin emër. I futet rrugës së politikës, por me të gjetur dashurinë, i duhet të dalë prej saj, por s'është kollaj.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Jackass
programme.desc: Viti i prodhimit: 2002. Seriali komik më i përfolur dhe më i bujshëm në Amerikë. Xhoni Noksvill dhe shokët e tij marrin përsipër akte nga më të çmendurat, më qesharaket e të guximshmet, thjesht për t'u argëtuar.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Dua jetën tënde
programme.desc: 2011. Jason Bateman, Ryan Reynolds. Dejv, mendon se miku i tij më i mirë Miç, një beqar pa strese, ka jetën perfekte. Ndërsa Miç, mendon se Dejv ka familjen perfekte. Dhe një mëngjes, ata e gjejnë veten, duke jetuar jetët e njëri - tjetrit...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Familja e marrë
programme.desc: Toni Collette, Anthony LaPaglia. Pasi gruaja e tij mbyllet në një spital psikiatrik, një politikan punëson një grua aspak të zakontë për t'u kujdesur për pesë vajzat e tij.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Befas në Paris
programme.desc: Simon Helberg, Melanie Lynskey. Bazuar në ngjarje të vërtetë. Quinn dhe e dashura e tij e parë janë bashkë prej vitesh dhe ai është gati t'i bëjë propozimin për martesë, deri kur një bjonde bukuroshe i rrëfen se është e dashuruar me të...
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Shkolla e maskarenjve
programme.desc: Billy Bob Thornton, Jon Heder, Jacinda Barrett. Për ta ndihmuar që të bëjë për vete vajzën e ëndrrave, një i ri i pafat në çdo gjë që bën, regjistrohet në një kurs vetëbesimi. Problemi është se dhe profesori i tij pëlqen të njëjtën vajzë.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Puthja e parë
programme.desc: Hakani ka probleme me krijmin e marrëdhenieve afatgjata me gratë. Gjërat ndryshojnë kur bie në dashuri me shikim të parë me Baharin. Por ka një pengesë. Ai duhet ta bëjë të dashurohet me të cdo ditë nga e para.
programme.category: Komedi Romantike

programme.title: Një i marrë në liri
programme.desc: Tim Allen, Ray Liotta, Sigourney Weaver. I sapo liruar nga burgu, Tomi zbulon se jeta jashtë hekurave është shumë më e vështirë. E motra s'e lë rehat, shoku i vjetër kërkon ta fusë sërish në lojë dhe ish e dashura e përndjek kudo...
programme.category: Komedi
krim

programme.title: E fejuara e babit
programme.desc: Massimo Boldi, Simona Ventura. Mes dy gjyshërve të ardhshëm do të çelë një romancë e papritur, që do t'i vërë të gjithë para dilemave të panumërta dhe do të krijojë një mal me telashe.
programme.category: Komedia Italiane

programme.title: Më në fund erdhe ti
programme.desc: Asa Butterfield, Maisie Williams. Një adoleshent hipokondriak përballet me frikën e tij ndaj vdekjes kur një vajzë adoleshente e sëmurë terminale, i kërkon ta ndihmojë të plotësojë listën e saj të guximshme të dëshirave.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Ujqit
programme.desc: Lucas Till, Stephen McHattie. Pasi prindërit e tij masakrohen, një djalosh vihet në kërkim të historisë së familjes dhe zbulon një qytezë likanësh.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Fushat londineze
programme.desc: Billy Bob Thornton, Amber Heard. Bazuar në romanin me të njëjtin titull te Martin Amis. Pasi një femër fatale parashikon vdekjen e saj, josh në mënyre të përllogaritur tre burra, një prej të cilëve, ajo e di që do të jetë vrasësi i saj.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Nata e peshkaqenit
programme.desc: Sara Paxton. Një grup miqsh, shkojnë për pushime në një ishull privat mes një liqeni. Të etur për argëtim, ata zhyten menjëherë në ujë. Por dikush ka lëshuar në liqen peshkaqenë gjigantë dhe pushimet kthehen në një tmerr vdekjeprurës...
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Dhoma e panikut
programme.desc: Jodie Foster, Kristen Stewart, Forest Whitaker. Një grua dhe vajza e saj, fshihen në dhomën më të sigurt të shtëpisë për t'i shpëtuar tre grabitësve. Por pikërisht kjo dhomë kthehet në një 'burg' që nuk i dihet nëse do t'i mbijetojnë.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Dritarja e fshehtë
programme.desc: Pas ndarjes me të shoqen, shkrimtari i famshëm Mort Rainey, përballet papritur, në shtëpinë e tij të vetmuar buzë liqenit me një te panjohur të rrezikshëm. Quhet John Shooter dhe pretendon se Ranye i ka kopjuar tregimin e tij.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Unë nuk jam fundamentalist
programme.desc: Regjisorja Mira Nair, tregon sesi dyshimet e gabuara mund të shkatërrojnë jetën e kujtdo. Kur një amerikan rrëmbehet në Pakistan, agjentët e C.I.A-s mendojnë se një profesor pakistanez është përgjegjës. Por e vërteta është krejt ndryshe...
programme.category: Thriller politik

programme.title: Kërcënim për rrjetin
programme.desc: Chris Hemsworth, Viola Davis. Një pirat rrjeti i talentuar, lirohet nga burgu për të ndihmuar agjentët amerikanë dhe kinezë në gjetjen e fajtorit të disa sulmeve kibernetike...
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: The Ugly Truth
Gola istina

Heigl is like in her previous movies very good, she is made for this type of movies and Butler is a real surprise, he did excellent in his very first romantic comedy. In conclusion, The Ugly Truth is a very enjoyable comedy for men and women.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":211102,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2009-09-23","keywords":"bad date,tv show,nudity,wrapped in a towel,blonde","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Ugly Truth - Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3848143641","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMwNTAyNTk4N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODU4NDczMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMwNTAyNTk4N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODU4NDczMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A macho morning TV show correspondent (Butler) makes a bet with his love-challenged producer (Heigl): If his tips on how to land and keep a guy don't work, he'll quit the business.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001337/","name":"Katherine Heigl","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0124930/","name":"Gerard Butler","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0877430/","name":"Bree Turner"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0525659/","name":"Robert Luketic"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005323/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2946831/","name":"Nicole Eastman","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0527581/","name":"Karen McCullah","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0809006/","name":"Kirsten Smith"],"duration":"PT1H36M"</script><metacontent="
